skins.shipDescription: Good Miovening! I'm Ookami Mio. Over here, I seem to be... some sort of aircraft carrier. Let's get along well.
skins.selfIntroduction: I sure hope I'll get to enjoy this world with the rest of the gang! Say, Commander, have you heard about the Hololive Gamers?
skins.acquisition: Good Miovening! I'm Ookami Mio. Over here, I seem to be... some sort of aircraft carrier. Let's get along well.
skins.login: Oh! Commander! I've been waiting for you to login! I'm ready to head out, so let's get sortieing! We can spend the whole day together... Anyway, let's try to have fun?
skins.details: This rigging is pretty cool, isn't it... Right, Ookami Mio: DESTROY MODE! ... What? It's actually meant to destroy things?!
skins.secretaryIdle1: I wonder if I'll be able to make friends in this world~?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Doing a concert here would be sooo much fun. I'd love to belt out some classics! Do sing along if you know any of the songs, Commander.
skins.secretaryIdle3: These destroyers are just adoooorable! Do you think they'd come over for dinner if I made food? We could sleep together, take a bath together, and I could feed them my pudding~
skins.secretaryTouch: Ooh? What's wrong? Hmm? You just want my attention~?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hey! No touching my tail! Now my hair that looks like tails... I guess that's okay.
skins.secretaryHeadpat: You can't just go petting a wolf...! Commanders get special treatment?!

skins.shipDescription: I changed into my swimsuit, but I wonder if it looks right on me? An outfit like this might make you feel breezier just by looking at it~
skins.acquisition: I changed into my swimsuit, but I wonder if it looks right on me? An outfit like this might make you feel breezier just by looking at it~
skins.login: Good Miorning, Commander! C'mon, let's go-go-go to the ocean!
skins.details: You think I've gotten a little sexier? Hey! My eyes are up here...! But if you're happy then I guess it's fine... Just don't always be looking so naughty.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Pretty cute swim ring, huh~! It's got wolf ears on the side~ what? You can't tell?
skins.secretaryIdle2: The beach is all about cold sodas and barbecues~? I can't wait to eat some with you, Commander. Come on, Commander!
skins.secretaryIdle3: I really like just floating on the water in this thing. Hey Commander, come try it with me~
